setting.title: View Fimimportorder
setting.columnlabels: Import Order/Invoice No.,Currency,Client Id,Bank,Import Order/Invoice /LC Amount,Invoice Raised Amount,Advance Paid,Invoice Amount Paid,Trade Credit,Net Import Order Amount Payable,Costing,Expected Shipment Date,Usance Period,Expected Due Date,Unhedged Amount,Forward Booking Amount,Forward Booking Rate,Conversion Rate,Profit/ Loss From Costing,Profit/ Loss from Spot rate on Remittance Received,Spot rate on Import Order Received Date,Forward rate on Import Order Received Date,Product,Remark,Supplier Name,Invoice No.,Invoice date,Credit Days,Invoice Due date,Payment Term,Document Type,Import Order Date,LC No.,LC Issuing Bank /Bank (Collection),Bank Ref No,Bill of Entry No.
setting.query:
select $COLUMNS$ from tbl_fimimportorder
LEFT JOIN tbl_exposurecurrencymaster ON exposurecurrencymaster_exposurecurrencymasterid=fimimportorder_exposurecurrencymasterid LEFT JOIN tbl_bank ON bank_bankid=fimimportorder_bankid LEFT JOIN tbl_paymentterm ON paymentterm_paymenttermid=fimimportorder_paymenttermid LEFT JOIN tbl_documenttype ON documenttype_documenttypeid=fimimportorder_documenttypeid $Search$
setting.searchbylabels: Import Order/Invoice No.,Currency,Import Order/Invoice /LC Amount,Net Import Order Amount Payable,Expected Due Date,Unhedged Amount,Invoice date,Import Order Date
